short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension to make sure you are muted on Google Meets

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension was made for the type of person who always forgets if they are on mute. It will add a green or red border whether you are unmuted or muted respectively.

v1.1 - Add radio button feature (Push to talk) - User can hold down radio button to unmute. When user lets go of button mutes automatically.
